participant_1.name: Mia
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and playful, Mia enjoys interacting with animals and has a light-hearted approach to life.
participant_1.background: I waitress during the day to supplement my income. I wear a motorbike helmet to protect my head. I've light skin with big brown eyes. My main transportation is my motorbike. It's red with a blue stripe so it's shiny when I race.

participant_2.name: Jack
participant_2.personality: Creative and a bit introverted, Jack enjoys writing and has a fondness for animals, though he often feels lonely.
participant_2.background: I love dogs. I live in Alabama. I like tacos. I've one brother. I have three sisters.
